Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1000 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware support WebGL - OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: 7 SP1; 8.1 or later; 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: These are the recommended specs published by Vive for the original HTC Vive. Our app does have a less intense option (rendering 1/10th the objects) for lower-spec machines.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700, AMD Ryzen 5 2400G equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080/RTX 2060, AMD RX Vega 64/RX 5700 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: We are a small outfit with only one VR machine currently (Vive, RTX 2080, Intel i7-8700K, 64 GB Ram). As such, we would appreciate any feedback that users have on the performance of "Galactic Center VR" with your setup(s).
